summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4524 for the improvement of Ellis Avenue from East Marginal Way to 12th Avenue South, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52979, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
